stitched.midnightconfig.title: Stitched Configs
stitched.midnightconfig.explosionProofIt:
When set to "SOME",
Set specific items to be explosion proof using the #stitched:explosion_proof tag
stitched.midnightconfig.explosionProofBl: Blast Protection Items are Immune to Explosions

Makes all items with blast protection immune to explosions.
When true, applies regardless of the state of blast proof items
stitched.midnightconfig.fireProofItems.t:
When set to "SOME",
Set specific items to be fire proof using the #stitched:fire_proof tag
stitched.midnightconfig.fireProofFirePro: Fire Protection Items are Immune to Fire

Makes all items with fire protection immune to fire/lava.
When true, applies regardless of the state of fireproof items.
stitched.midnightconfig.extendWaterRegio: Farmland can be Hydrated from Water Below
stitched.midnightconfig.echoShardRings.t:
When having an echo shard in your inventory,
there is a chance they ring out emitting vibrations
stitched.midnightconfig.blocksReleaseSpa: When mining a block without the correct tool, the block will emit sparks
stitched.midnightconfig.iceAndSnowDontMe: Ice and Snow don't Melt in Cold Biomes
stitched.midnightconfig.moreEndermanSafe: By default, this only adds the Dragon Head, however, others can be added using the #stitched:enderman_safe tag.
stitched.midnightconfig.sneakSweetBerrie: Players Sneak through Sweet Berry Bushes Without Harm
stitched.midnightconfig.bundleChanges.to: Makes items stored in bundles (especially unstackables) not take up more space then specified below.
stitched.midnightconfig.copperGrateFallt: Small Entities Fall Through Copper Grates
This value is found by taking the average of all 3 sides.
stitched.midnightconfig.drowningDrops.to: This is controlled by the loot table under minecraft:entities/drown/[entity]
